resources.string: To use Alexa, you must sign in to Amazon. Go to <font color=\'#33B5E5\'>amazon.com/code</font> and enter this code:
With Alexa, you can ask to play music, get directions, place calls, control smart home devices, and more - just by asking.
\"Alexa, what else can I do in my vehicle?\"
To learn more and access additional features, download the Alexa app on your phone.
